name: Escape from Khabarovsk
description:
Simple gameplay

Just click on the "Escape from Khabarovsk" button and find out the results of the raid, it can be either successful or not. Earn money, complete quests, improve the shelter, and so on... The best thing is that Escape from Khabarovsk is absolutely free, and you can play it wherever you are!

It's absolutely free!

You can follow the development of the project in our discord server: https://discord.gg/pUZbrcCq (Bean Lair) (Russian Server)

The creator of the game:

VK: https://vk.com/x_king_x1233 and YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/KiNGs_PeoplePlayground
